lead_paragraph: The state can try again to put to death a killer whose 2009 execution was called off after he cried in pain for two hours while receiving 18 needle sticks, the Ohio Supreme Court said Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Ohio: State Gets Second Chance at Execution
headline.main: Ohio: State Gets Second Chance at Execution

snippet: The state can try again to put to death a killer whose 2009 execution was called off after he cried in pain for two hours while receiving 18 needle sticks, the Ohio Supreme Court said Wednesday.
